trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around February 21st 2012
Summary: v shaped strobe orange red lights left to right 5 objects then one object at a time southwest then one south southwest then center,
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter the initial event of the 5 objects visible at once with the strobing lights (6) flashing v shaped from left to right, then there were single glows starting at southwest of my position from hiway 4 and the stephenville rd then south southwest then in the middle of the two previous. they did not flash like a beacon but flared on and off in the span of 2 seconds like a glow on and off. the color was red orange. I know what flares look like and there is no flare that can reach 10 to 12 thousand feet. they were statioary the event lasted for the 30 minutes I was at the intersection. The event appereared to be over the stephenville area
